page.title: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway Pro

revision.text:

|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = UniFi Security Gateway |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Pro |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = USG-PRO-4 |page_start_date = 6 April 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ubiquiti_Networks_UniFi_Security_Gateway_Pro |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Router Firewall |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = UNIFI_SGPRO_REV01 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN6120; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640ETTI-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SanDisk;SDIN7DP2-4G; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = PC3-12800 |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = UniIC;HXMSH2GS04A1F1C-16K; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;B50280C1;B50280C1KFBG; |eth3chip = Broadcom;BCM5482;BCM5482S; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- IEEE 802.3?,IEEE 802.3,IEEE 802.3/3u,IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab,IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab/3bz --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B4:FB:E4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2012.04.01;UBNT Build Version: e221_002_01aa9; |stockos = Linux;3.10.107-UBNT;EdgeOS;
|exp_if_types = SFP/RJ45 Combo, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = 2 |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.5 |pwr_conn = C5
|serial = yes,, console (RJ-45),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 2x SFP/RJ45 Combo ports, metal case, heatsink, dual fan |addchip = 16Mbit SPI Serial Flash;cFeon;QH16-104HIP;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, PCIe 3.0 Clock Generator with 1 HCSL Outputs;Pericom;P16C557;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;6;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;4;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;6;, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- UNIFI_SGPRO_REV01 --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAPNMHYE1286 |asin = B019PBEI5W |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Cavium]] ''Octeon II'' CN6120 :SoC: Dual-core [[MIPS64]] @1.0GHz *Flash (SPI): 8MB (''[[Macronix]]'') :Flash (eMMC): 4GB (''[[SanDisk]]'') *RAM: 2GB (DDR3 PC3-12800) SODIMM *Network: 2x GbE LAN, 2x GbE WAN :ports (shared RJ45/SFP cage) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 100-240V ~1.5A 50/60Hz
==Links of Interest== :[https://dl.ubnt.com/datasheets/unifi/UniFi_Security_Gateway_DS.pdf Datasheet] :[https://dl.ui.com/unifi/firmware/UGW4/4.4.57.5578372/GPL.UGW4.v4.4.57.5578372.tbz2 GPL Firmware Source]
